summary: Provides an end‑to‑end example of the Graph Random Neural Network (GRAND) for semi‑supervised node classification on citation graphs, including a PyTorch/DGL model implementation and a command‑line script to train, evaluate, and tune the model with various hyperparameters.
business_intent: Showcase and benchmark the GRAND algorithm for graph‑based learning, offering a ready‑to‑run reference implementation that helps researchers and developers experiment with state‑of‑the‑art GNN techniques on standard datasets.
